extension.name: Horizontal scrolling slideshow
extension.author: Gopi.R
extension.description: Lets you showcase images in a horizontal scroll style. Scroll will start automatically. Slideshow will pause on mouse over.

field.name: slideshow_type
field.label: Image type
field.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (the default is JPG).

field.name: slideshow_folder
field.label: Image folder
field.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site URL (e.g. modules/mod_horizontal_scrolling_slideshow/images).

field.name: slideshow_link
field.label: Image link
field.description: A URL to redirect to if the image is clicked upon. (e.g. http://www.gopiplus.com)

field.name: slideshow_width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Enter the width of the slideshow. (e.g 200)

field.name: slideshow_height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Enter the height of the slideshow. (e.g 150)

field.name: slideshow_speed
field.label: Slideshow speed
field.description: Enter the slideshow speed. (larger is faster 1-10)

field.name: slideshow_bgcolor
field.label: Slideshow BG color
field.description: Enter the BG color of the slideshow. (e.g. #FFFFFF)

field.name: slideshow_gap
field.label: Slideshow gap
field.description: Enter pixels gap between each slideshow images. (e.g. 5)
